description:
Up is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Pixar animated film Up (2009).
The film stars 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen, who travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway, a Wilderness Explorer boy named Russell. Along their journey, they encounter a giant bird that Russell names Kevin and a "talking", friendly dog named Dug.
name: Up
